description: This course is designed to help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
It covers essential features such as Live Q&A Sessions, Progress Tracking with Learning Pathways, Feedback Mechanisms via Surveys and Polls, and Team Introductions for Real-Time Training and Support.
